item.title: medium trip to smg
item.description:
intro

It is the third time for me visiting Semarang, where the first was in a alumni meeting and the second was in an assignment, and now it is also in another assignment. Unfortunately, both events are not documented. The second was on July 2024 and I forget about the first. It seems that the habit to document a trip on Medium was after July 2024.

So, I will document this one as a story on Medium 1, but I am not very sure what it is about. A title comes up after a discussion 2.

item.title: upd trip prep
item.description: Note on preparing a reasearch trip to Makassar, attending seminar and collecting sand samples in five days.
